name: BrokenFolx
description:
CHROME SUGGESTED

CW: HOMOPHOBIC SLURS, MISGENDERING, VICTIM BLAMING, MENTION OF SEXUAL HARASSMENT

[ Please Play With Audio ON, Headphones Preferred! Donations have tiers]

BrokenFolx

is a game played with mouse or touch. I focused on simplicity, as I wanted to lower the barrier of entry, because this is about narrative.

This is a game about the lived experiences of individuals who are Queer. The capital on the Q is important.

Donate $5 and get a downloadable version, donate $7 and get that AND the soundtrack to listen to outside the game.

I hope you enjoy it, I had a lot of fun putting this together, and its very personal and close to my heart.

And let me know what you think, on Twitter: HERE~

-Arielle Grimes
